nodes.text: The Dur-24 wrist laser was a portable wrist laser manufactured by BlasTech Industries.

The Dur-24 was comparable to a standard BlasTech blaster rifle in terms of power, and had a range of fifty meters. The bounty hunter Boba Fett used a Dur-24 wrist laser, mounted on his left wrist gauntlet directly above his Czerka ZX miniature flame projector.
